statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:ESDomain) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ESDomain)<-[:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(n:DNSRecord) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Clean up DNSRecords pointing to ESDomains within the current AWS account
